name: The Tutorial To Play This Game
name_original: The Tutorial To Play This Game
description:
What happens if the tutorial becomes the game?

The objective of the tutorial is to play this game.

The game is quite a short game and is a little idea made concrete.

Tools used

Game made in less than 10 hours from scratch using Construct 2, Audacity and Photofiltre.

Ending music generated with This Exquisite Music Engine.

Everything made by one italian guy!

scarma.altervista.org - Pizza language website

scarma.itch.io - Other games made by me (more coming soon!)

HINT: Words are meaningful.
